/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a cloudy sky. The street is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the movement of the vehicles.
